subtitleNullable: Explore the long-term trends in annual temperature anomalies
descriptionNullable:
The dataset contains the annual average land and ocean temperature anomalies.

Anomaly is calculated with respect to the 1901-2000 average.

The dataset can be used to analyze trends in global temperature and predict the anomaly values in the upcoming years.
title: Global Temperature Anomaly Time Series
subtitle: Explore the long-term trends in annual temperature anomalies
description:
The dataset contains the annual average land and ocean temperature anomalies.

Anomaly is calculated with respect to the 1901-2000 average.

The dataset can be used to analyze trends in global temperature and predict the anomaly values in the upcoming years.
